author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: A good winter dessert when fresh fruit supplies are limited
name: Warm Fruit Compote Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large apples, peeled, cored, and chopped
1 firm ripe pear, peeled, cored, and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat. Add the fruit and cinnamon stick. Cook gently, stirring often, until the fruit has completely softened.
Stir in the sugar and heat for a couple of minutes, or until the sugar has dissolved.
Remove the pan from the heat, and stir in the lemon juice. Serve warm with a spoonful of yoghurt or a drizzle of honey.
